PeepServer Capistrano Tasks
  by Geoffrey Grosenbach
  http://topfunky.com
  
== DESCRIPTION

Capistrano tasks for setting up and maintaining a CentOS server, such as is installed at RailsMachine. Use as a starting point for your own server automation tasks.

Use at your own risk.

The peepcode:setup task will try to install nginx, git, and other software.
